name: The Beast
description: The final boss, a catastrophic creature of chaos. Seven heads, four horns, and three red eyes per head. Razor-sharp claws, fangs, and dark magic that warps the multiverse.
lore: Once a guardian of balance, now corrupted by forbidden dark magic, The Beast merges dimensions and spreads chaos across the multiverse.

abilities.name: Dark Vortex
abilities.description: Pulls players and objects into deadly vortexes.

abilities.name: Dimensional Shatter
abilities.description: Merges terrains from multiple dimensions, causing disorientation.

abilities.name: Minion Summon
abilities.description: Calls waves of monsters to aid the Beast.

appearance.heads: Seven reptilian heads, each distinct. Each head has three blood-red eyes, and unique features such as scars or broken horns.
appearance.horns: Two massive downward-curving horns and two smaller upward horns.
appearance.eyes: Three glowing, blood-red eyes per head, with one eye on the forehead.
appearance.body: Covered in overlapping obsidian scales with glowing cracks pulsing dark energy.
appearance.claws: Razor-sharp, sword-length claws dripping with a viscous dark substance.
appearance.aura: A swirling distortion effect, fragments of broken dimensions hover around its massive form.
